item.title: How to Solve Killed Git Error in Homebrew Mac
item.description: Error occured during Git installation without xcode $ git zsh: killed git What I have was only brew. Didn’t want to install xcode Check $ brew config HOMEBREW_VERSION: >=2.5.0 (shallow or no git repository) ORIGIN: (none) HEAD: (none) Last commit: never Core tap ORIGIN: (none) Core tap HEAD: (none) Core tap last commit: never Core tap branch: (none) HOMEBREW_PREFIX: /opt/homebrew HOMEBREW_CASK_OPTS: [] HOMEBREW_MAKE_JOBS: 8 Homebrew Ruby: 2.6.3 => /System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/2.6/usr/bin/ruby CPU: octa-core 64-bit arm_firestorm_icestorm Clang: 12.
